text: Plaza Hotel is a historic hotel building located at Trenton, Grundy County, Missouri. It was built in 1929–1930, and is a five-story, Art Deco style reinforced concrete building. The building measures approximately It has a pre-cast, concrete block exterior, concrete roof and floors. (includes 20 photographs from 1997) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2001. ==References== Category:Hotel buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Art Deco architecture in Missouri Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1930 Category:Buildings and structures in Grundy County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Grundy County, Missouri
title: Plaza Hotel (Trenton, Missouri)
